attributes.title: APP WILL TRY TO HACK YOU!!! HACKERS!!

I REPEAT, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.title: DELETE THIS APP!!
attributes.review: Ok so Iâ€™m one to never write reviews on apps even if theyâ€™re bad because most of the time Iâ€™m too lazy to do so.. attributes.title: Donâ€™t download!! WORST APP EVER!

Then a week ago it actually downloaded and my phones been glitching SO BAD! one night I was trying to uninstall the app and I got an alert from he app that had my address in t and my friends and families name threatening to disappear us if I uninstalled the app. Iâ€™m now currently moving houses to another country because Iâ€™m afraid of my own life and others. attributes.title: This app made my dog die
attributes.review: It was horrible. When I first downloaded the app I did it as a joke. But then these awful glitches came. The glitches were so bad it would shut off my phone or it would have a full on seizure. I thought that the normal thing to do would be to delete the app so i tried. But when I went to delete it my phone had the biggest seizure yet. It was vibrating aggressively and my screen was flashing I for sure thought that I had broken my brand new phone. I turned my head and realized that my dog was acting strange. He was behaving exactly like the phone, seizing. I began to worry so I hid my phone under the couch to check on him, no matter what I did he would just keep on freaking out. The second my phones glitching stopped, so did my dog. I turned him over and he was dead. All in all, worst app ever, itâ€™s not dog friendly and deserves zero stars.(btw donâ€™t try and tell me that that the app didnâ€™t kill him, thatâ€™s HIGHLY disrespectful)

attributes.title: i am blind now. i had to write this through brail
attributes.review: So a few days ago I decided to get this app because all these white supremacists finally convinced me that trump is an okay guy. I mean if you look past him being sexist, racist, homophobic, and a rapist, you can see that he is just the average american with a low iq that can truly relate to all of his voters. Any who as i was using this app it started glitching out completely. All of a sudden i started seeing flashing white lights and my phone wouldnâ€™t turn off, but since i was so interested in what trump had to say on his app i stared at the flashing lights for over an hour resulting in a stroke and blindness. I would not recommend using this app if you enjoy seeing. Also since iâ€™m blind i might accidentally not vote for trump because i canâ€™t see anything. I actually think that my hand might hover over biden, and that i will vote for biden by accident. (a vote that isnâ€™t for biden is a vote for trump) anyways TRUMP 2020ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸

attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I realized the negative energy it gives out. I was expecting to find a president who can be respected by the people. But instead it was someone who is just simply not suitable for the job. Itâ€™s sad that people continue to be blinded by this man. And itâ€™s sad that people feel bad for this man who has millions of dollars to fall back on. Itâ€™s sad that people care for this man who cares for no one but his own personal gain. The slogan everywhere on this app says â€œMake America great again.â€ Im not sure why he chose this slogan, because it seems that America has gotten worse since he became president. This man allows people to think its okay to be racist, this man is not a leader. This mans America is a racist one. This is not the America we the people want and he is not the one the people chose. As long as he continues to be president hate, and evil will continue to spread. Because that is his presidency. Itâ€™s evil and hateful just like this app.

attributes.title: Bloody Horrific
attributes.review: Iâ€™m from Liverpool, England, and I got this app to see what Donald Trumpâ€™s plans were for the elections. I opened the app, but then I saw an orange Oompa Loompa staring off into the distance, and I thought â€œWhy is this thing the front page?â€ I then concluded that picture was actually Donald Trump! I gasped out of fear. I never saw his image before! I then educated myself with his beliefs and with the things he has said before, and now I realize this was a horrible app to download! I would never recommend this app to anyone. Iâ€™m heading over to the indigenous peopleâ€™s homeland to take the 13 colonies back. My family and I will pay for the plane tickets. We will take the Trump supporters and racists too, so that â€œthe land of the freeâ€ will be a place for POC. I say that POC start lynching white- OH THAT WENT A LITTLE TOO FAR, DIDNâ€™T IT? (Maybe not...) Overall, this was a horrible app, and I would never recommend this to anyone! This is a disgusting and horrible app. Have a good day!
